programme.title: NHL Hockey Edmonton Oilers at Dallas Stars
programme.desc: For the second straight season, the Stars and Oilers duel in the West finals, starting with Game 1. Edmonton vanquished Dallas in six games in 2024 for their first Stanley Cup Final berth since 2006. Dallas has made four of the last five West finals.

programme.title: NHL Hockey Edmonton Oilers at Dallas Stars
programme.desc: The Oilers try to make sense of their West final against the Stars, down 1-0 entering Game 2. Edmonton led 3-1 after two periods in Game 1 before Dallas scored five unanswered goals in the third for a 6-3 victory. Tyler Seguin (DAL) scored twice.

programme.title: NHL Hockey Dallas Stars at Edmonton Oilers
programme.desc: The deadlocked Western Conference final shift to Canada for Game 3 between the Stars and Oilers. Edmonton tied the series at 1-1 with a 3-0 victory over Dallas in Game 2. Stuart Skinner stopped all 25 Stars shots after allowing five goals in Game 1.

programme.title: NHL Hockey Dallas Stars at Edmonton Oilers
programme.desc: The Stars try to get even with the Oilers in Game 4 of the Western Conference finals. Edmonton leads the series 2-1 after an emphatic 6-1 victory in Game 3. Connor McDavid scored twice in that contest, giving him a postseason-most 22 points.

programme.title: NHL Hockey Edmonton Oilers at Dallas Stars
programme.desc: The Oilers look to book a return trip to the Stanley Cup Final in Game 5 against the Stars. Edmonton set up the potential clinching contest with a 4-1 victory at home over Dallas in Game 4. Corey Perry (EDM) notched a goal and an assist in the win.
